sentences.sCn: 她把头发漂成了金黄色。

sentences.sContent: The wood had been bleached by the sun .
sentences.sCn: 木头已被太阳晒得褪了色。

remMethod.val: b + leach(过滤) → 将其他颜色滤去 → 去色

words.tran: 漂白剂；漂白业者；露天看台

trans.tranOther: to make something pale or white, especially by using chemicals or the sun

trans.tranCn: 漂白剂； 漂白的行为
trans.tranOther: a chemical used to make things pale or white, or to kill  germ s
